description.en: Used to change a database field value when a petition is successful. Note that this action cannot be used on balances or transactions as it would violate verification.

The column containing a particular value which is used to identify the row(s) to apply the change to. These rows will have their value changed if the petition is successful. In SQL  'where ForField = ForValue'
The unique value which identifies one or more rows to apply the change to. These rows will have their value changed to NewValue if the petition is successful. In SQL  'where ForField = ForValue'
The new value that will get applied if successful.
Can be 'hex', 'number' or 'base64'. Blank or 'string' means its textual.
